settings.title: nice to meet you
settings.text: We're on a mission to provide laughter and joy to people going through tough times

settings.title: Our Story
settings.text:
Our mission is to provide laughter and joy to people going through tough times. It's especially needed in a hospital. Often, patients receive hospital gifts like flowers, teddy bears or cards.

We decided to create colorful and unique hospital grip socks to cheer people up, since we know being in the hospital isn't very fun. These hospital grip socks are for those who need a smile, in and out of the ER in any slippery situation.

A big part of the journey towards healing is having a positive mindset. We hope these hospital grip socks from Dr. Socko will let people know we are rooting for their success.

settings.title: We Know Being in the Hospital Sucks
settings.text: Being in the hospital can be a real downer. And if you're trying to find a gift for someone in the hospital, it can be even more difficult. The usual suspects - teddy bears and flowers - have been done a million times before. They're not always the most practical or useful gifts. But you want to give something that will be appreciated and actually make a difference. It's a tough challenge, and one that can leave you feeling frustrated and stuck. So what do you do when you want to give a gift that's unique, thoughtful, and actually helpful for someone in the hospital?

settings.title: The Best Gift for Someone Special in the Hospital
settings.text: At Dr. Socko, we know that laughter is the best medicine, and that's why we've created the perfect gift for someone in the hospital. Our fun and colorful grip socks are specially designed to bring a little humor and positivity to even the toughest situations. They're also a practical gift that will make a difference for someone in the hospital. So if you're struggling to find the right gift, look no further than Dr. Socko - we've got just what the doctor ordered.

settings.title: Falling Down Should Be the Least of Your Worries
settings.text: No one likes taking their loved ones into the ER for preventable falls! Look no further than these hospital grip socks to prevent slippage year round.

settings.title: Your Feet Deserve the Best
settings.text: Made from natural bamboo and cotton, these hospital grip socks are durable with full padded cushion. The stretchy fabric ensures easy slip-on with a wide top. We also made sure to avoid having an annoying toe seam.

settings.title: You Can Look Good To Feel Good
settings.text: A big part of the journey towards healing is having a positive mindset. Not only are these hospital grip socks useful, but their designs will have you giggling all day long.
